extension.summary: Watch Major American Television Networks Live for Free! USTV Now - Wardoctor Patched
extension.description: Please visit http://facebook.com/groups/tardisbuilds/ for addon support! Watch Major American Television Networks Live! Entirely Legal and Free! You can also record content with a paid DVR account or by using DVR referral points. Signup for a free account through the following link today: http://watch.ustvnow.com
